channel.title: Exporting Auxy into FL Studio
channel.description:
Looking to figure out the best way to export from Auxy to FL Studio. I'm not sure if just exporting wavs is the way to go? Stems? Project Link? Ableton Live?
Any help would be appreciated along with any tips/tricks on your workflows and what you like to tweak in FL Studio. Thanks!

item.title: Exporting Auxy into FL Studio
item.dc:creator: str8zstar
item.description:
Awesome, thanks for the tips @Eswyn!

Read full topic

item.title: Exporting Auxy into FL Studio
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
Export stems and export midi. If you’re trying to use the Auxy sounds and add more non-Auxy stuff, you’ll just need stems. If you’re just trying to do the whole track in FL (non-Auxy sounds) then just export the midi. If you want the Auxy sounds layered with FL sounds, do both. It depends what you want.

Read full topic
